evidence.claim: All Hands Home Care utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company employs Twilio for secure communication with healthcare clients.
They ensure compliance with HIPAA regulations for patient data security.
Offers integrations with FHIR for health data interoperability.
Uses RESTful APIs for service integration with EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or clearinghouse integrations found.
